column2: Dividend-focused fund managers find more appeal in U.S. consumer stocks NEW YORK

column3: July 07 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A-' rating to the  senior unsecured notes due 2046 issued by Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:  FRT; Federal).
